sourcesContent: import { useState } from 'react'; export default function AddressInput (props) { const [line1, setLine1] = useState() const [city, setCity] = useState() const [zip, setZip] = useState() let style; (props.stage === 2) ? style = {gridRow: '10 / span 5'} : style ={}; function handleAddressChange (e) { setLine1(e.target.value) } function handleCityChange (e) { setCity(e.target.value) } function handleZipChange (e) { setZip(e.target.value) } return ( ) }
